resources.string: To make the assistant work, please enable the permissions below.
For the floating button and on-screen assistance.

Warning, you have an incoming call but the phone is in silent mode.

You need to enable our service manually.

What to do:
1. Tap “Open Settings” below.
2. In the system list, find “Senior Rescue Assistant”.
3. Turn the main switch On.
4. Confirm enabling the service.

We need notification access to warn about calls in silent mode.

What to do:
1. Tap “Open Settings” below.
2. Find “Senior Rescue Assistant” in the list and enable notification access.
3. Return to the app to continue.

Disable power saving for the app so it works reliably in the background.

What to do:
1. Tap “Open Settings” below.
2. In the system prompt, choose “Allow”.
Tap to activate your voice assistant.
It looks like not all permissions were granted. To ensure proper operation, please finish the setup.
To allow highlighting elements, enable the “Show above other apps” permission for Senior Rescue Assistant.
Hello. I am your voice assistant. To make our communication comfortable, please tell me how I should address you.
Sorry, I\'ve encountered a problem. Please try again.
Okay, what name would you like to use?
Please state the language you\'d like to switch to.
Please choose a speech speed. I can speak slower or faster.
Sorry, I didn\'t catch that. Please rephrase. Say \'name\', \'language\', or \'speed\'.
\'%1$s\' language is not supported. Please choose between Russian and English.
Language not recognized. Returning to the main menu.
I didn\'t understand. Please say \'faster\' or \'slower\'.
Command not recognized. Returning to the main menu.
Got it, I will call you %1$s.
Since you didn\'t provide a name, I will call you: %1$s.

I've set everything up.
I will call you: %1$s.
Communication language: %2$s.
Speech rate: %3$s.
